dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Well heeeeeeeeey there little guy, name's Wally. What can I do for ya?

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Hmmm? Oh yeah I swam down here to get away from the noise of the pirate yelling the same 4 phrases.

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Scook told me that treasure will get them to leave, but she doesn’t realize I can’t fit in the caves and the ship is blocking my way to swim out.

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: I can help you find treasure in other ways though. Bring me items and I can upgrade your swim speed and oxygen resevoir...

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: For a price of course, fish will do.

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Here are some tips: Watch your oxygen meter, if that depletes you'll pass out! Look for oxygen bubbles in cave systems, those will replenish your oxygen.

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: In dark caves, you can rely on echolocation to see the cave walls. I can help you improve this skill, in exchange for a few fish.

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: And you can use right-click to boost!

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Good luck, I'll be here waiting.

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Well heeeeeeeeey again, got something for me?

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: I can repurpose this item and get you better suited for the caves!

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Well heeeeeeeeey again, there are still items to be found in the caves! Take a look at what I have to offer in the meantime.

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Take a look at what I have to offer.
